titles.title: Lake Traverse Reservation Heirship Act of 2007
A bill to amend Public Law 98-513 to provide for the inheritance of small fractional interests within the Lake Traverse Indian Reservation.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.

bill.summary: 7/30/2007--Introduced. Lake Traverse Reservation Heirship Act of 2007 - Amends federal Indian law to provide for the inheritance of small fractional interests within the Lake Traverse Indian Reservation.
